testbed.db
Class DBWrapper

java.lang.Object
  testbed.db.DBWrapper

public class DBWrapper
extends java.lang.Object

This is a wrapper agent for the database. It provides connectivity to the database, and allows other modules in the testbed to read to and write from the database.

Author:
tomas, zvi, guillaume

Constructor Detail

DBWrapper

public DBWrapper()
          throws DatabaseException
Creates a new instance of DBWrapper. Reads the DB properties file called "db.properties" (presently hardcoded). Creates a connection to the MySQL server (with table "test" as argument, see initializeDatabase for more information on the creation of * the database and initialization of the tables). The "db.properties" file should contain the fields : database (=game-xxx-xxx-xxx), url (=jdbc:mysql://), portNumber(=3306), hostName(=localhost), login (=muller), password (=dbpass). At first instantiation, we connect to the "test" DB and call initializeDatabase(). This is HACK allows to connect to SQL server then CREATE DB "database". Next connections are direct connections to "database" and initializeDatabase() is NOT called.

Throws:
DatabaseException - if an access error to the DB occurs.
See Also:
for info on the creation of the database.
Method Detail

getDBProperties

public void getDBProperties()

public java.lang.String[] getDownloadableTableNames()

public java.lang.String getConnectorPath()

deleteGameFromDB

public void deleteGameFromDB(java.lang.String gameName)
Deletes all the entries of the game "gameName" from the DB. catches all the exceptions and does not throw any. It is assumed that any error comes from the fact the gameName does not exists.

See Also:
for information on the opening of the connection to the MySQL server.

storeAgentCharacteristics

public void storeAgentCharacteristics(java.lang.String gameID,
                                      int timeStep,
                                      java.lang.String agentID,
                                      double bankBalance,
                                      double clientShare,
                                      double avgRelAppError,
                                      double relAppErrorStDev)
                               throws DatabaseException
Adds an entry to the 'agent_informations' DB which logs all bankAccounts and clientShares.

Parameters:
gameID - the name of the game.
timeStep - the time step considered.
agentID - the agent ID of the considered agent.
bankBalance - the bank balance of agentID at timeStep.
clientShare - the client share of agentID at timeStep.
Throws:
DatabaseException - if there is an access problem to the server/database.

storeWeight

public void storeWeight(java.lang.String gameID,
                        int timeStep,
                        java.lang.String beneficiaryAgentID,
                        java.lang.String targetAgentID,
                        java.lang.String eraName,
                        double weightValue)
                 throws DatabaseException
Adds an entry to the 'weights' DB that logs all weights passed by the SimEng.

Parameters:
gameID - the name of the game.
timeStep - the time step considered.
beneficiaryAgentID - the agent that weights targetAgentID.
targetAgentID - the agent judged by beneficiaryAgentID.
weightValue - the rating associated to targetAgentID by beneficiaryAgentID.
Throws:
DatabaseException - if there is an access problem to the server/database.

storeSensedValue

public void storeSensedValue(java.lang.String gameID,
                             int timeStep,
                             java.lang.String appraiserID,
                             java.lang.String appraisedClientID,
                             double appraisedValue,
                             double relativeAppraisalError)
                      throws DatabaseException
Adds an entry to the 'sensed_values' DB that logs all sensed values by timestep.

Parameters:
gameID - the name of the game.
timeStep - the time step considered.
appraiserID - the ID of the considered appraiser.
appraisedClientID - the ID of the client the appraiser "appraiserID" is appraising for. Each Client has only one painting to be appraised, so ClientID=PaintingID.
appraisedValue - the value the appraiser "appraiserID" associates to the painting it appraises for client "appraisedClientID".
Throws:
DatabaseException - if there is an access problem to the server/database.

public void storeTrueValue(java.lang.String gameID,
                           int timeStep,
                           java.lang.String PaintingID,
                           double trueValue)
                    throws DatabaseException

Parameters:
gameID - the name of the game.
timestep - the considered time step.
PaintingID - the ID of the painting considered.
trueValue - the true value of the painting PaintingID *******(in the game GameID)*******
Throws:
DatabaseException - if there is an access problem to the server/database.

storeMessage

public void storeMessage(java.lang.String gameID,
                         int timeStep,
                         java.lang.String sourceAgentID,
                         java.lang.String destinationAgentID,
                         java.lang.String typeOfInteraction,
                         java.lang.String content)
                  throws DatabaseException
Adds an entry to the 'communications' DB that logs all messages.

Parameters:
gameID - the name of the game.
timeStep - the timestep when the message has been sent.
sourceAgentID - the sender agent.
destinationAgentID - the receiver agent.
type - the type of the message. It has to be choosen in : LogMessage.OPINION_REQUESTER_REQUESTS, LogMessage.OPINION_PROVIDER_REPLIES, LogMessage.REPUTATION_REQUESTER_REQUESTS, LogMessage.REPUTATION_PROVIDER_REPLIES.
content - the content of the message of type "type" from sourceAgentID to destinationAgentID.
Throws:
DatabaseException - if there is a problem during access to the DB/server.

registerParticipant

public void registerParticipant(java.lang.String username,
                                byte[] hashedPassword)
                         throws DatabaseException
Adds an entry to the 'participants_registration' DB. Associate participant to their registration Number and hashed passord.

Parameters:
username - is the name of the user to be added.
hashedPassword - is the hash of the password for the user identified by "registrationNumber".
Throws:
DatabaseException - if an error occurs during access to the DB/server.

registerAgentClass

public void registerAgentClass(java.lang.String username,
                               java.lang.String gameID,
                               java.lang.String agentName,
                               java.lang.String agentClassPath,
                               java.lang.String agentClass)
                        throws DatabaseException
Add an entry to the 'participants_agent_classes' DB. Associate participant (identified by their registrationNumber to the full path (later, URL?) to their agent class.

Parameters:
gameID - the name of the game.
agentName - is the name of the participant's agent.
agentClassPath - is the path where to find one of the Agent classes (if several allowed) of the participant identified by registrationNumber
Throws:
DatabaseException - if an error occurs during access to the DB/server.

storeGameConfig

public void storeGameConfig(java.lang.String gameID,
                            java.lang.String status,
                            int numberOfDummies,
                            int numberOfSessions,
                            int numberOfTimeStepsPerSession,
                            int numberOfPaintingEras,
                            double f_clientFee,
                            double cp_opinionCost,
                            double cr_reputationCost,
                            double a_sensingCostAccuracyRatio,
                            double q_OldClientShareInfluence,
                            long gameStart,
                            int numberOfAgentsPerParticipant,
                            boolean safeMode,
                            java.lang.String agentPackage,
                            long threadWait,
                            int averageClientsPerAgent,
                            java.lang.String myARTAgentDir,
                            java.lang.String testbedClassPath,
                            java.lang.String jarClassPath)
                     throws DatabaseException
Stores some of the part of the Game Parameters that goes into the "game_configs".

Parameters:
gameID - the name of the game.
status - is the status of the game (Game.STATUS_READY,Game.STATUS_COMPLETED,Game.STATUS_IN_PROGRESS)
numberOfDummies - the number of Dummy agent in the game.
numberOfSessions - the number of Sessions in the game.
numberOfTimeStepsPerSession - the number of timestep in each session of the game.
numberOfPaintingEras - the number of painting eras for this game.
f_clientFee - the client fee used in this game.
cp_opinionCost - the cost of an opinion in this game.
cr_reputationCost - the cost of a reputation opinion in this game.
a_sensingCostAccuracyRatio - the cost of sensing.
q_OldClientShareInfluence - the ratio of the old client share with respect to the new one.
gameStart - the Date when the game should start.
numberOfAgentsPerParticipant - the number of agents each participant can have in the game.
Throws:
DatabaseException - if a problem occurs while accessing the database on the MySQL server.

                                        throws DatabaseException
Retrieves the hashed password for the participant identified by regNumber from the DB.

Parameters:

Throws:
DatabaseException - if an error occurs during access to the DB/server.

userExists

public boolean userExists(java.lang.String userName)
Returns true if the user userName is already associated to a password in the DB, false otherwise.

Parameters:
userName - the name of the user which presence in the DB is to be checked.
Returns:
boolean that is true if the user userName is already registred in the DB.

retrieveAgentClassAndUser

public java.lang.String[] retrieveAgentClassAndUser(java.lang.String agentID,
                                                    java.lang.String gameID)
                                             throws DatabaseException
Retrieves the agentClass from a participant regNumber.

Parameters:
agentID - is the name of the agent considered.
gameID - is the name of the game considered.
Returns:
an array of Strings that gives (1) the owner of the agent agentId in game gameID, (2) the full path of the class for this agent.
Throws:
DatabaseException - if an error occurs during access to the DB/server.

retrieveAgentCharacteristics

public AgentInformation retrieveAgentCharacteristics(java.lang.String gameID,
                                                     int timeStep,
                                                     java.lang.String agentID)
                                              throws DatabaseException
Get an agent's Characteristics (bankBalance and clientShare) at a given timestep.

Parameters:
gameID - the game considered.
timeStep - the considered timstep.
agentID - the considered agent.
Returns:
AgentInformation datastructure representing the available informations (bankBalance and clientShare) on agent "agentID" at time step "timeStep".
Throws:
DatabaseException - if an error occurs during access to the DB/server.

retrieveWeight

public java.lang.Double retrieveWeight(java.lang.String gameID,
                                       int timeStep,
                                       java.lang.String beneficiaryAgentID,
                                       java.lang.String targetAgentID,
                                       java.lang.String eraName)
                                throws DatabaseException
Get an agent weight for another agent at a given timestep in gameID.

Parameters:
gameID - the game considered.
timeStep - the considered timstep.
beneficiaryAgentID - the judging agent.
targetAgentID - the judged agent.
Returns:
a Double representing the ratings beneficiaryAgentID associates to targetAgentID at time step timeStep.
Throws:
DatabaseException - if an error occurs during access to the DB/server.

retrieveFee

public java.lang.Double retrieveFee(java.lang.String gameID,
                                    int timeStep,
                                    java.lang.String agentID,
                                    java.lang.String typeOfFee)
                             throws DatabaseException
Get an agent fees for the type of fee "typeOfFee" at a given timestep in gameID.

Parameters:
gameID - the game considered.
timeStep - the considered timstep.
agentID - the considered agent.
typeOfFee - the type of fee considered.
Returns:
Integer representing the net transaction fees paid to/by this agentID during this timestep.
Throws:
DatabaseException - if an error occurs during access to the DB/server.

                                     throws DatabaseException
Throws:
DatabaseException

retrieveSensedValue

public java.lang.Double retrieveSensedValue(java.lang.String gameID,
                                            int timeStep,
                                            java.lang.String appraiserID,
                                            java.lang.String paintingID)
                                     throws DatabaseException
Get an agent SensedValue for a clientID's painting at a given timestep in gameID.

Parameters:
gameID - the game considered.
timeStep - the considered timstep.
appraiserID - the appraiser considered.
paintingID - the painting considered.
Returns:
a Double representing the value agent appraiserID senses for paintingID at timeStep. Or null if there is no such paintingID registered at timeStep.
Throws:
DatabaseException - if an error occurs during access to the DB/server.

retrieveTrueValue

public java.lang.Double retrieveTrueValue(java.lang.String gameID,
                                          int timeStep,
                                          java.lang.String paintingID)
                                   throws DatabaseException
Get an agent TrueValue for a clientID's painting at a given timestep in gameID.

Parameters:
gameID - the game considered.
timeStep - the considered timstep.
paintingID - the painting considered.
Returns:
a Double representing the true value for paintingID at timeStep. Or null if there is no such paintingID registered at timeStep.
Throws:
DatabaseException - if an error occurs during access to the DB/server.

retrieveMessage

public LogMessage retrieveMessage(java.lang.String gameID,
                                  int timeStep,
                                  java.lang.String senderID,
                                  java.lang.String receiverID,
                                  java.lang.String typeOfInteraction)
                           throws DatabaseException
Get an agent message to another agent of a certain type at a given timestep in gameID.

Parameters:
gameID - the game considered.
timeStep - the considered timstep.
senderID - the ID of the sender agent.
receiverID - the ID of the receiver agent.
typeOfInteraction - the type of Interaction. To be choosen in: LogMessage.OPINION_REQUESTER_REQUESTS, LogMessage.OPINION_PROVIDER_REPLIES, LogMessage.REPUTATION_REQUESTER_REQUESTS, LogMessage.REPUTATION_PROVIDER_REPLIES.
Returns:
LogMessage DataStructure representing the message senderID sent to receiverID at TimeStep for the type of interaction "type".
Throws:
DatabaseException - if an error occurs during access to the DB/server.

retrieveAllMessages

public java.util.Vector retrieveAllMessages(java.lang.String gameID,
                                            int timeStep)
                                     throws DatabaseException
Get all messages at a given timestep in gameID.

Parameters:
gameID - the game considered.
timeStep - the considered timstep.
Returns:
Vector representing the list of all messages exchanged at timeStep.
Throws:
DatabaseException - if an error occurs during access to the DB/server.

computeNbMessages

public java.lang.Double computeNbMessages(java.lang.String gameName,
                                          int timestep,
                                          java.lang.String agentSrc,
                                          java.lang.String agentDest,
                                          java.lang.String type)
                                   throws DatabaseException
Computes the number messages of type _type (Reputation/Opinion) from agentSrc to agentDest at timestep in game gameName.

Parameters:
gameName - the game considered.
timestep - the timestep considered.
agentSrc - the sender.
agentDest - the receiver.
type - the type of messages ("Reputation" or "Opinion" or one of the LogMessage.MESSAGE_TYPES).
Returns:
Integer that represents the number messages of type ("Reputation" or "Opinion" or one of the LogMessage.MESSAGE_TYPES) from agentSrc to agentDest at timestep in game gameName.
Throws:
DatabaseException

timestep - the timestep considered.
agentID - the agent which we want the evaluated painting list.
Returns:
